features: HEPA AIR PURIFIER: Air purifier has a 3-stage filtration system: pre-filter, H13 true HEPA filter and high-efficiency activated carbon filter for air dust, pollen, pet hair as small as 0.3 microns, perfect for pet owners, babies, children and the elderly, effectively improving indoor air.
SMALL BUT POWERFUL: Small size and modern design, making it easy to fit in any small space like bedroom, dorm room, nurseries, office that coverage up to 108 sq.ft, 360° air intake powerful enough.

WHISPER QUIET: This small air purifier is built-in high-efficiency AC motor, which can effectively reduce the noise of carbon brush friction, quiet and smooth when running at high speed, low power consumption.Enjoy a restful night of sleep with a constant supply of fresh air.

USER-FRIENDLY: This portable bedroom air purifier is very easy to operate. Three settings control different functions and are clearly divided so that anyone can operate it. 3 fan speed switching, with three adjustable speeds to meet individuation purification and cleaning level preferences. 3 timer options (/2H/5H/8H) allow you to set the usage time flexibly.
FETIONS REPLACEMENT FILTER: FETIONS has its own genuine replacement filters for air purifiers. You can get the Replacement Filter by searching for the ASIN "B0CLD2KNQX" or "B0CLCZMZ76" on Amazon.

NOTICE: If there are any questions with the product, please feel free to contact us directly via Amazon, we will deal with it at first time. We provide friendly customer service and help you to solve the problem, 1-Year Warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, high-flow air purifier
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier has a powerful fan compared to others its same size. The airflow on the lowest level of the three is about the same as the max airflow of some other single-room air purifiers we have, and on the lowest setting it is very quiet, probably where they come up with the 24db sound power rating for this unit. On medium and especially on high you can hear the fan running and the air moving, but it is moving much, much more air than the other purifiers. I would say it will purify the air in a room much faster than other units because of this higher air flow.The filter is very easy to change and doesn't require any tools. The base of the until unlocks with a twist revealing the filter which can be removed by hand. It comes with a 110V 2-prong power supply plug instead of the USB connection that other room-sized purifiers have, and this may be the reason the fan motor is so much more powerful. It needs to be plugged in to work, as it does not contain a battery.The only complaint I have about it is the display on top, which is relatively straight-forward with an on/off button, a fan control button that cycles between the three fan speeds, and a timer control button that allows you to set the unit to go off after pre-set amounts of time. The issue is that when the unit is powered off, the power button light flashes, and flashes, and flashes to let you know the unit is plugged in and ready to go. When it is on, the power light is solid. I don't know why I need to have the power button flash when it is off. I find this very annoying when the unit is in a dark bedroom to have a light flashing all the time in the dark if it's not on. I ended up putting a piece of electrical tape over the LED light for the power so I can't see if flash. Other than that, it is a nice, very powerful little air purifier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I really love to quiet this machine was
reviews.reviewText: You can turn this machine on and it was whisper quiet. There are several modes that you could set and it would turn itself off automatically. I felt like a game my office a crisp clean refreshing feeling after it was done running. I'm pretty sensitive to machine noise and this really didn't bother me so I think it's a good product overall for what it does to filter dust or small pollen or whatever out of the airIt has its own filter that you'll have to get it from the manufacturer and hopefully they'll be around available when it's time to replace it. I would say that is the only risk of this product that might give one pause. Otherwise it's a solid product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hey Everyone, Dori here. This air purifier is really awesome. I love that it can also be used for aromatherapy. The amount of dust it sucks up is amazing to me. It's so gross to look at especially knowing that without using this machine we'd be breathing in all that extra crap in the air. Just makes my skin crawl thinking about it. I really can't wait to get my camera fixed so I could take pictures of the uglyness of dust and crap we breathe. Definitely worth every penny, highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Clean Air
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely little air purifier. I wanted to get an air purifier because my studio apartment has a lot of dust and dander. I had a cat staying in my apartment for the last 6 months, which left a lot of hairs. I also just like the idea of inhaling cleaner air. So, I got this air purifier to keep by my bed because I spend a lot of time working from home in bed and, of course, sleeping. I usually wake up feeling kind of groggy and congested, but found that I feel a bit less stuffed up since I started using this. The fan is powerful, yet quiet. I can keep this right next to my bed while sleeping and working without feeling disturbed by the noise from the fan. It is very easy to assemble and operate. When first setting it up, the power cord is actually located inside of the purifier, which can be opened by twisting the console. The filter then sits inside the console, and no further set up is required. I was able to operate this almost immediately without having to use any tools or instruction guides. For the price, this feels like a bargain. It comes with a HEPA filter and I think it even has an aroma infuser, which is a nice plus. This has been great dealing with the cat hairs and dust ever since the cat left. It doesn't really take up much space. Also, it automatically lets you know when the filter needs to be changed by having all the lights light up. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewerName: Hello, the good and the  bad !
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it is a decent small air purifier
reviews.reviewText: It is decent small air purifier. It is small for a bedroom maybe, baby room. I found the fan to be fairly quiet. The airflow is good, and that means it is working good. The higher intake airflow the higher output. Filter is easy to change. It is a decent air purifier especially for the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This is great as a budget friendly option for a "Small Room" Air Purifier!!!So far, so good - I've been using it in our bedroom, which is pretty small, and its worked splendidly! The first day, after a few hours, I noticed NO SMELL in our room!! Which was pretty amazing as its an older home (70s) and after fixing a water leak we'd been struggling to get rid of this mild musty like smell coming from the window area. 4 days later, continuous use, and the smell is STILL GONE!! So it is most definitely working!!!It's pretty quiet, though there is a slight sound. It's similar to white noise to describe it best and personally find it soothing at night. I also LOVE that you can optionally use essential oils for added fragrance during use, or choose not to, which is pretty great.This will work best in small bedrooms, bathrooms, closets and RVs. For the cost, it is ABSOLUTELY worth it and I highly, highly recommend this purifier! It works great!9/10!! Thank you!
